title: Местные новости
overview: Comedy series on the life of the Rostov journalists. The main character - a young man Maxim (Pavel Kravtsov) - escapes from Moscow from domineering mother and hateful of the Institute to grandma in Rostov-on-don. His roommate turns out to be Marina (Marina Her) - journalist of the local newspaper. Thanks to her Maxim manages to get a photographer for this newspaper, to gain a chance at a new independent life and together with the audience to experience a series of unusual and funny events
